title: ‘Horrific’ terrorist attacks in Chad and Cameroon condemned by UN Security Council (UN - United ...
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations ) 12 October 2015 - The members of the UN Security Council have strongly condemned the 'horrific' terrorist attacks attributed to Boko Haram , perpetrated on Saturday and Sunday in the towns of Baga Sola , Chad ,
